short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to remind you to wash your hands frequently

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Washing hands is one of the best ways to protect yourself and your family from getting sick. This is a simple extension to remind you to wash your hands frequently. The extension sends you timed notifications
